keyword: in n out flying dutchman calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Flying Dutchman

disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, patty size, cheese type, and cooking; check In-N-Out app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out Flying Dutchman packs 390 kcal and 37 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in In-N-Out Flying Dutchman?
faqs.a: Approximately 390 kcal for one standard Flying Dutchman.

faqs.a: About 37 g protein from the two beef patties.
Yes, with only 2 g carbs and no bun, it's low-carb at 390 kcal.
